Synopsis: Five years after a meltdown on national TV, journalist Simon Hunt (Richard Gere) joins forces with a former colleague (Terrence Howard), and a cub reporter (Jesse Eisenberg) in Bosnia. Their mission is to find that country's most-wanted war criminal, a man dubbed "The Fox." Working from sketchy information at best, the trio travels deep into hostile territory in search of the scoop of a lifetime.
Title: The Hunting Party
